title: Is Riven getting played more frequently?

replies.body: Yeah It's time to main Garen Boys (Next minute Garen nerf)
(the real reason behind garen nerf, to buff riven)
Everytime i pick rumble in norms, im up against a riven and i stomp her, strange.
Every single normal mode I play solo theres a Riven, a Vayne or a Shyvana.
